item.title: The IBM Kenexa Talent Suite leverages big data to benefit HR
item.description:
IBM has introduced a new software-as-a-service (SaaS) product designed to provide Chief Human Resources Officers (CHROs) and other executives with valuable insights from employee data. The cloud-based IBM Kenexa Talent Suite helps organizations enhance the efficiency and accuracy of their hiring processes, boost workforce productivity, and foster employee connections in ways that positively influence business outcomes. This software empowers HR teams to analyze extensive employee data, encompassing work history, social interactions, skills development, and individual interests...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-ibm-kenexa-talent-suite-leverages-big-data-to-benefit-hr/
